ingredients: 1 (9 inch) pie crust pastry,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 1 cup sour cream,   +   1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1  egg, beaten, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 large pears - peeled, cored and sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 29g 38%, Saturated Fat 14g 70%, Cholesterol 73mg 24%, Sodium 355mg 15%, Total Carbohydrate 86g 31%, Dietary Fiber 7g 24%, Total Sugars 42g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 6mg 31%, Calcium 75mg 6%, Iron 3mg 14%, Potassium 309mg 7%
